column1: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Colombo to Hambantota via Galle. Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in
the other sea areas around the island during the afternoon or night.
Winds will be south-westerly and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

ind speed can increase up to (50-55) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Galle to Batticaloa via Matara, Hambantota and Pottuvil.
